explanation: [0-0] In a Minecraft game screen, inside a prison cell with yellow warning stripes, a police officer in a blue uniform is escorting a prisoner in a turquoise shirt and blue pants into the cell using a baton.

[0-8] After being kicked into the cell by the prison guard, the prisoner falls to the floor. The guard closes the cell door. At this moment, the prisoner gets up and greets a green-skinned inmate who is lifting weights. The green-skinned inmate is startled, his eyes widen, and the barbell falls onto his foot. He then hides under a bunk bed, only his head exposed, his face full of fear as he trembles.

[8-14] The camera then pans to the right, where an inmate in a turquoise shirt and another in a brown shirt are sitting face-to-face playing tic-tac-toe. The new prisoner approaches and greets them. The two playing tic-tac-toe are also frightened, jumping up with their mouths and eyes wide open. They bump into each other in their panicked escape, quickly get up, and jump onto the wall to avoid him. He then turns around, revealing a terrifying red monster face.

[14-22] A blue button with the word "HELP" appears in front of the mutated prisoner. Next to the button are a thumbs-up gesture and a clicking hand gesture. The number "3" appears below the button and starts counting down. After it ends, the mutated prisoner walks to the prison bars where a police officer is walking towards him with a baton. Suddenly, the prison lights go out, and the entire scene plunges into darkness. The camera zooms in on the mutated prisoner's face, revealing his horrifying red monster face. The terrified prison guard faints and drops his keys.
